TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
6 hours ago, tjsnh said:

The shenzhou-ish orbital module actually makes a pretty good Apollo-Soyuz docking adaptor.

or also the Mir-Shuttle/Buran orange docking module

21 hours ago, Beale said:

Hello!

Thanks!

The Apollo CSM by itself is a very attractive project, very simple spacecraft to put together. 
I think the problem is it does not standalone well, and it would be difficult to release it without calls for associated rockets and the LEM.

(There is ASTP, but there is such a rich history with the Skylab, Apollo, I cannot give the spacecraft the proper credit it deservers, but someone can).

I think there should be a bit more American spacecraft to go with Gemini. Anyways, is Gemini a separate mod now?

18 hours ago, Beale said:

I think the "only" things needed are the docking pressure adapter and the actual docking ports

Where this model sufficiently good enough?

Spoiler

base diameter: 0.9375m

airlock diameter: 0.625m

diameter over all: 1.25m

Edited July 14, 2016 by hraban

On 2016-06-23 at 7:53 PM, Beale said:

Whoops! I will remove them.

Unfortunately some mod support has fallen out of date over many versions. It is one of the parts of the mod that I have not had the ability to keep up to date (I have relied mostly on the very kind and appreciated work of others). 

There are updated Station Science Configs back on page 405 of this thread.  They are up to date and confirmed to work.  You never added them so I figured you were not interested.

Contents of the _Extra_StationScience.cfg file.  The other file I had on page 405, is no longer needed.

Spoiler

@PART[Vega_Crew_D]:NEEDS[StationScience]
{
  MODULE
  {
    name = StationScienceModule
    moduleName = Station Science Facility
    requiredTrait = Scientist
    ConverterName = Research Lab
    StartActionName = Start Research
    StopActionName = Stop Research
    AutoShutdown = false
    GeneratesHeat = false
    UseSpecialistBonus = false

    INPUT_RESOURCE
    {
      ResourceName = ElectricCharge
      Ratio = 0.00138888888
    }

    OUTPUT_RESOURCE
    {
      ResourceName = Eurekas
      Ratio = 0.00027777777
    }
  }
}
Make more IVAs

10 hours ago, Djolox said:

I think there should be a bit more American spacecraft to go with Gemini. Anyways, is Gemini a separate mod now?

Gemini is now availabile in Bluedog Design Bureau (or here, I guess).

So, really, there is no strong representation of America any longer in the mod (you might argue with the Cygnus and LEM-like fuel tank).

Will this change? Maybe not. The only things I would really like to do is maybe:

  • D2
  • Apollo CSM (Maybe just for my own entertainment of modelling)

But, as you can notice, Tantares is shrinking, rather than adding large new things.

7 hours ago, hraban said:

Where this model sufficiently good enough?

  Hide contents

base diameter: 0.9375m

airlock diameter: 0.625m

diameter over all: 1.25m

Wow! 

That's more than sufficiently!  

1 hour ago, Leszek said:

There are updated Station Science Configs back on page 405 of this thread.  They are up to date and confirmed to work.  You never added them so I figured you were not interested.

Contents of the _Extra_StationScience.cfg file.  The other file I had on page 405, is no longer needed.

  Reveal hidden contents

@PART[Vega_Crew_D]:NEEDS[StationScience]
{
  MODULE
  {
    name = StationScienceModule
    moduleName = Station Science Facility
    requiredTrait = Scientist
    ConverterName = Research Lab
    StartActionName = Start Research
    StopActionName = Stop Research
    AutoShutdown = false
    GeneratesHeat = false
    UseSpecialistBonus = false

    INPUT_RESOURCE
    {
      ResourceName = ElectricCharge
      Ratio = 0.00138888888
    }

    OUTPUT_RESOURCE
    {
      ResourceName = Eurekas
      Ratio = 0.00027777777
    }
  }
}

 

Many thanks!
I think I must have forgotten about this, in either case it is included for next release.

@Beale, given your current situation in regards to how much time you can devote to Tantares, I think you'd be best off just focusing on the updates/revamps, rather than trying to tackle an entire new part family.

With that said, Apollo D2 is tantalizing... (tantarizing?)

Edit: And my goal is still to try and have Apollo CSM in game by the end of summer. Saturn V and the LEM, no promises. But at least they are on their way now!

Edited July 14, 2016 by CobaltWolf

10 minutes ago, CobaltWolf said:

And my goal is still to try and have Apollo CSM in game by the end of summer. Saturn V and the LEM, no promises. But at least they are on their way now!

Would it be stockalike? I've been looking for that for so long.

23 minutes ago, Joeybafoey said:

Would it be stockalike? I've been looking for that for so long.

Oh dear, you haven't seen Bluedog Design Bureau have you? 

Yea, it'll be stockalike. We've also got the whole Saturn family lined up, with Saturn 1 already done.

1 hour ago, Beale said:

Gemini is now availabile in Bluedog Design Bureau (or here, I guess).

So, really, there is no strong representation of America any longer in the mod (you might argue with the Cygnus and LEM-like fuel tank).

Will this change? Maybe not. The only things I would really like to do is maybe:

  • D2
  • Apollo CSM (Maybe just for my own entertainment of modelling)

But, as you can notice, Tantares is shrinking, rather than adding large new things.

Yeah, anyways you keep doing an awesome job keeping this mod up! It is better and better with each part remodel and retexture. I don't think we even need more parts, as you've covered almost all significant Soviet and Russian spacecraft.

Edited July 14, 2016 by Djolox

1 hour ago, Yarik180703 said:

Make more IVAs

 

He will when he wants to. I don't mean to be rude, but he isn' obligated to make a single new IVA he will when he wants to, just be patient.

1 hour ago, VenomousRequiem said:

Oh dear, you haven't seen Bluedog Design Bureau have you?

I've looked at it, but I'm usually not usually not a fan of huge parts packs, with the loving exception of Tantares. What I want to do is fly the Saturn V and N1-L3 in the same save file at the same time for an RP, but I can't have more than one big parts pack (Tantares) and a few enhancements (Realchute, Procedural Fairings).

1 minute ago, Joeybafoey said:

I've looked at it, but I'm usually not usually not a fan of huge parts packs, with the loving exception of Tantares. What I want to do is fly the Saturn V and N1-L3 in the same save file at the same time for an RP, but I can't have more than one big parts pack (Tantares) and a few enhancements (Realchute, Procedural Fairings). 

I think we'll be breaking it up into smaller packs soon, but I think this discussion would be better suited for the BDB thread.

Probably right

Yeah, anyways you keep doing an awesome job keeping this mod up! It is better and better with each part remodel and retexture. I don't think we even need more parts, as you've covered almost all significant Soviet and Russian spacecraft.

There are a lot of half-finished "misc" parts I would like to finish.

Kosmos-1443
TKS
